verbs.description: [V: should] us have domestic terrorism law the package bombs sent to democrats across the country and the killings of jews at a pittsburgh synagogue may seem like clear - cut cases of terrorism but the suspects will almost certainly never face terrorism charges robert bowers attorney united states department of justice washington united states department of state united states ap cesar sayoc donald trump ku klux klan general rod rosenstein fbi state department pittsburgh synagogue dylann roof terrorism joshua zive federal bureau of investigation murder center on national security fbi agents association obama administration director fcc becky richey president isis band mary mccord karen greenberg isis pubfile 10tv com official justice department fordham university law school south carolina
